title: Pobrežje District
text: The Pobrežje District (; ) is a city district of the <a href="City%20Municipality%20of%20Maribor">City Municipality of Maribor</a> in northeastern <a href="Slovenia">Slovenia</a>. In 2014, the district had a population of 13,006. The Pobrežje District is subdivided into North Pobrežje (), East Pobrežje (), West Pobrežje (), and South Pobrežje (). Maribor Cemetery, the largest cemetery in the city, is located in the district.
